import React, { Component } from "react"; import CourseService from '../../Services/courseService' let courseService = new CourseService() export default class CourseModal extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { course: { tenKhoaHoc: "", moTa: "", hinhAnh: '/img/default-image.jpg' }, search: "" } } onChangeSearch = e => { this.setState({ search: e.target.value },this.props.handleSearch(this.state.search)) } onAddCourse=()=>{ let ngayTao = new Date(); courseService.addCourse(this.s) } render() { return (
Add New Course
); } }
